name: LeadGenius
headline: LeadGenius is an account-based marketing and lead generationâ¦
description:
LeadGenius is the most efficient way to equip sales and marketing teams with custom B2B lead data at scale. Our data experts conduct ongoing research to automatically supply teams with accurate contact information and hard-to-acquire data points for your most valuable buyer personas.

By combining a remote global workforce, custom data, and machine learning, LeadGenius delivers the highest lead generation value in the marketplace.

founders.name: Prayag Narula
founders.description: I am the co-founder and ex-CEO of LeadGenius. We use a combination of technology and crowd to give your sales and marketing team best insights into your target accounts.  I

# Find, win and keep more clients with precision data at scale.
Stop targeting contacts with generic one-size fits all data. Start getting your ideal customer data on demand.
[Try it NowArrow Right](http://leadgenius.com/<https:/app.leadgenius.com/sign-up>)
JOIN THE WORLD'S BEST GO-TO-MARKET TEAMS
## Why people love LeadGenius
![Precision+Scale](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/655bdb5b40bf448fc9d41db2_custom.svg)
#### Precision + Scale
Dive deep or go broad. Experience unmatched data precision, quality, and coverage on your terms.
![Insights](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/655bdbd2824f258853d6f738_repository%201.svg)
#### Unique Insight
110+ insights on individuals and companies, or create your own, to engage effectively for a competitive edge.
![on demand](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/655bdb7f1783c991606a25b4_server%201.svg)
#### On-Demand
We’re not just a generic database. We deliver custom-sourced data tailored to your specific business needs.
![Global](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/655bdb2a9905126bd6617e48_Global%20data.svg)
#### Global
Global contact and account intelligence, uniquely sourced per region, ensuring compliance with GDPR, LGPD, and beyond.
![Consolidation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/655bc68ef0f9944ad209c1ad_Consoildate.svg)
#### Consolidation
Upgrade or replace disjointed data solutions for better efficiency and ROI with LeadGenius.
## Everyone needs better Insights.
See how Go-to-Market leaders like you win with LeadGenius.
![Snowflake](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6525443539549f83dda628f6/655f8e0108920cc6bf1fd0aa_65400c8ec22f69ce2e3be1f5_Snowflake_Logocolor.png)

Daniel Day | Director of Account-Based Marketing

There’s no more guesswork and ambiguity involved in where opportunity lies or where to allocate resources from a business standpoint."

## All sales are personal.
Stop treating customers like pieces of data.
They are not generic SIC or NIC codes.
To close, nurture and keep them you need to know and engage them as people.
###### And to do that, at scale, you need precision data on Demand.
![Sales](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/66c4b0ac324137d15f578ad3_data%20points.svg)
## LeadGenius is the all-in-one precision data Platform to fuel your go-to-market team.
![All-in-one Precision Data Platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/652551cdfaf4654a99a7ccc2_Frame%20407.png)
## Get what you need done, just better.
![Plug Holes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6525443539549f83dda628f6/653c07457e64267aada99321_play%20001.svg)
Identify SMBs

[Learn More](http://leadgenius.com/</request-demo>)

![Plug Holes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6525443539549f83dda628f6/667c5a47bbd941904a185057_Global%20Data%20Play%20\(1\).png)
Find International Contacts
Uncover international contacts in EMEA, APJ, and LATAM with ease to fuel your global pipeline and remove blockers from global growth goals.
[Learn More](http://leadgenius.com/</request-demo>)
![Plug Holes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6525443539549f83dda628f6/66b3aa4af2d84370d106b107_champion%20monitoring.svg)
Track Champions & Decision Makers
Actively monitor the movement of key contacts at your customer & prospect accounts.
[Learn More](http://leadgenius.com/</request-demo>)
[See all PlaysArrow Right](http://leadgenius.com/<https:/app.leadgenius.com/sign-up>)
## We decode 40M+ businesses and 350M+ decision makers globally
To identify verified insights that help you quickly find, close and keep your perfect customers.
[Try It NowArrow Right](http://leadgenius.com/</request-demo>)
## Unlock the power of vertical insights
Contact data is essential, but insights are the new advantage. Use sector-specific insights to find vertical market opportunities.
![ecommerce](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/65256817ea2f6ed1dc554100_image%2013.png)

Unlock unmatched accuracy in customer targeting.‍

[Learn more](http://leadgenius.com/</verticals/healthcare-insights>)
![SMBs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/65c65973cf9cc9017ef20033_BG_smbs.png)

[Learn more](http://leadgenius.com/</verticals/smb-insights>)

## Insights beat generic, every time.
Pre-built, generic one size fits all data, is no longer enough. Today’s customer relationships start with precision insights.
##### One size fits all data
Everyone can get| 
##### Precision Insight
Only you gets  
---|---  
Food and Beverage, SIC 622736, NIC XYZ| Quick service restaurants specializing in Tex-Mex inspired cuisine with 5 star reviews that have new managers in the last 6 months.  
SMBs| SMBs established in the past 5 years with Revenues of $40M+ with 5M Instagram followers, Google Maps Review Scores of 4+, with annual technology spends of $3M+ and have a hiring growth rate of 20%+ in the past 2 years and hired new CEOs in the past 12 months.  
Healthcare Companies| Healthcare companies with patient volume of >100K a year with operational budgets of $20M+ and Telehealth adoption rates >25% in the last 12 months.

### Precision + Scale
See the forest with scale, find the trees with precision.
![global scale and precision](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/654563887be93c7ef08cd843_Scale.svg)
#### Scale
When you need broad outreach, get verified data on millions of companies and decision makers globally.
![AWS, Azure and Snowflake all use leadgenius](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6524046b09877b89f58c1ea8/6545671197a920c963017c71_precision.png)
#### Precision
When you need unique targets, get customer curated data sets and insights tailored to your specific business case.
Best of all, you get it all in one simple platform.
## Frequently Asked Questions
What is Precision Data?
Precision Data is highly specific and verified data sets tailored to a business's unique needs. Instead of generic, one-size-fits-all data, precision data offers detailed insights about potential customers, ensuring your outreach is more targeted and effective. With Precision Data, you can access unique granular information enabling you to engage with your audience in a more personalized and impactful way.
How is LG Different?
We built LeadGenius to help data-driven Go-to-Market teams like yours find their ideal customers. Instead of offering only generic data sets, we provide custom on-demand data and insights specific to your business, ensuring more relevant and actionable information. Our data covers over 30+ countries, is GDPR and CCPA compliant, and integrates directly into your workflow. It’s why we are trusted by many of the world's leading Go-to-Market teams.
How Much Does LG Cost?
The cost of LeadGenius varies based on the specific needs and scale of your business. We offer a range of packages tailored to different business sizes and requirements. To get a detailed quote and understand which package would best suit your organization. 
Please Contact Us.
How does LeadGenius use AI?
LeadGenius leverages LLMs and AI to gather and understand data from 440 Billion web resources. We also leverage a machine learning system called Tagger to organize insights and create lookalike audiences. 
## Plan, Prioritize and Prospect Smarter with Custom Data

## Frequently Asked Questions
What is Precision Data?
Precision Data is highly specific and verified data sets tailored to a business's unique needs. Instead of generic, one-size-fits-all data, precision data offers detailed insights about potential customers, ensuring your outreach is more targeted and effective. With Precision Data, you can access unique granular information enabling you to engage with your audience in a more personalized and impactful way.
How is LG Different?
We built LeadGenius to help data-driven Go-to-Market teams like yours find their ideal customers. Instead of offering only generic data sets, we provide custom on-demand data and insights specific to your business, ensuring more relevant and actionable information. Our data covers over 30+ countries, is GDPR and CCPA compliant, and integrates directly into your workflow. It’s why we are trusted by many of the world's leading Go-to-Market teams.
How Much Does LG Cost?
The cost of LeadGenius varies based on the specific needs and scale of your business. We offer a range of packages tailored to different business sizes and requirements. To get a detailed quote and understand which package would best suit your organization. 
Please Contact Us.
How does LeadGenius use AI?
LeadGenius leverages LLMs and AI to gather and understand data from 440 Billion web resources. We also leverage a machine learning system called Tagger to organize insights and create lookalike audiences.

generated_description:
### LeadGenius: Precision Data at Scale

LeadGenius is a company focused on account-based marketing and lead generation, effectively bridging the gap between sales and marketing teams and their ideal customers. Founded in Berkeley, CA, and part of Y Combinator Batch S11, the company has grown to a team of about 50 employees. While the exact founding year isn't provided, its evolution from a simple lead generator to an advanced platform illustrates the dynamic nature of the B2B landscape.

**Mission & Approach:**
At its core, LeadGenius aims to equip its clients with highly specific and verified B2B lead data tailored to their unique business needs. By employing a unique blend of a remote global workforce, custom data sourcing, and advanced machine learning, they offer unparalleled lead generation services. This combination allows for the acquisition of hard-to-find data points that are instrumental for companies looking to connect with their most valuable buyer personas.

**Key Features and Offerings:**
1. **Precision Data:** LeadGenius champions the idea that generic, one-size-fits-all data simply doesn't cut it anymore. Customers get access to precision data that is highly specific and relevant to their business.
   
2. **Custom Insights:** Users can benefit from over 110 unique insights on individual contacts and companies, enabling personalized engagement strategies to gain a competitive edge.

3. **On-Demand Access:** Rather than relying on a static database, the platform offers custom-sourced data that adapts to the particularities of a user’s business requirements.

4. **Global Reach:** With compliance in mind, LeadGenius provides global contact intelligence, ensuring data is sourced appropriately across regions and adheres to regulations like GDPR.

5. **Integration with Tools:** The platform integrates smoothly with popular sales and marketing tools, making it a versatile addition to any business’s tech stack.

**Client Success Stories:**
LeadGenius has shown measurable success for notable clients, such as:
- **Snowflake:** Achieved 85% full coverage of account data within six months and doubled their customer base across major regions.
- **Amazon Marketplace LATAM:** Precision targeting enhanced growth by fostering connections with a broader range of sellers.
- **Salesforce:** Streamlined their research process, saving significant staff time and enhancing data accuracy.

**Why LeadGenius?**
In a marketplace inundated with generic solutions, LeadGenius distinguishes itself with a methodology that mixes precision with scale. Whether it’s finding the perfect small or medium-sized business leads or tracking decision-makers across the globe, their platform is designed for companies that understand the importance of personalized and specific customer relationships.

LeadGenius isn’t just another data provider; it’s a strategic partner for businesses committed to elevating their go-to-market strategies with superior insights. For anyone looking to make smarter, more informed decisions in their sales or marketing efforts, taking a closer look at LeadGenius is certainly worth it. 

**Explore more at:** [LeadGenius Website](http://leadgenius.com)
